entry.title: Video Recordings of Alumni Sharing Events

link.title: Video Recordings of Alumni Sharing Events

entry.content:
We successfully organized two alumni sharing events on 22nd May and 17th July 2021. The video recordings of the events are now available on Youtube.

Studying and Working Abroad - 2021-05-22

Blockchain and Cryptocurrency - 2021-07-17
entry.summary: We successfully organized two alumni sharing events on 22nd May and 17th July 2021. The video recordings of the events are now available on Youtube.

entry.title: Alumni Sharing Series - Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies

link.title: Alumni Sharing Series - Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies

entry.content:
The next alumni sharing event is coming! Register Now! IEAA is organising an alumni sharing event on the topic of blockchain and cryptocurrencies. The details of the event is as follows:

Date

17th July, 2021 (Sat)

Time

4:30pm - 6:00pm (Hong Kong Time)

Venue

Online Event
(Zoom meeting link will be shared to participants before the event)

Host

Albert Au Yeung (BEng 2004)

Speakers

  • Dr. John Yuen (MPhil 2006) (Assistant Professor, HKU)
  • Dr. Joseph Liu (PhD 2004) (Director, Monash Blockchain Technology Centre & Associate Professor, Faculty of Information Technology, Monash University, Australia)
  • Mr. Shawn He (MScIE 2015) (Senior Quantitative Trader, Hexagram Company Limited, Huobi)

If you would like to participate in this event, please fill in the registration form. Please also tell us what would you like to learn about regarding studying and working abroad.

Please note that priorities will be given to current IE students and IE alumni if the number of participants exceeds the capacity of the event.

Thank you for your support. We look forward to chat with you in the event!
entry.summary: The next alumni sharing event is coming! Register Now! IEAA is organising an alumni sharing event on the topic of blockchain and cryptocurrencies. The details of the event is as follows: Date 17th July, 2021 (Sat) Time 4:30pm - 6:00pm (Hong Kong Time) Venue Online Event (Zoom meeting link will be shared to participants before the event)

entry.title: Alumni Sharing Series - Studying & Working Abroad

link.title: Alumni Sharing Series - Studying & Working Abroad

entry.content:
Register Now! IEAA is organising an alumni sharing event on the topic of studying and working abroad. The details of the event is as follows:

Date

22nd May, 2021 (Sat)

Time

8:30pm - 10:00pm (Hong Kong Time)

Venue

Online Event
(Zoom meeting link will be shared to participants before the event)

Host

Albert Au Yeung (IE01) (AI Engineer at LinkedIn, Ireland)

Speakers

  • Ben Cheng (IE04) (Co-founder of Oursky, HK & Taiwan)
  • Polo Chau (IE01) (Associate Prof. Georgia Tech, USA))
  • Michael Ng (IE00) (Software Engineer at Google, Germany)
  • Karen Pun (IE12) (SaaS Product Manager at Advanced Field Solutions Ltd., Ireland)
  • David Wong (IE02) (Senior ML Engineer at Beauty Labs, UK)

If you would like to participate in this event, please fill in the registration form. Please also tell us what would you like to learn about regarding studying and working abroad.

Please note that priorities will be given to current IE students and IE alumni if the number of participants exceeds the capacity of the event.

Thank you for your support. We look forward to chat with you in the event!
entry.summary: Register Now! IEAA is organising an alumni sharing event on the topic of studying and working abroad. The details of the event is as follows: Date 22nd May, 2021 (Sat) Time 8:30pm - 10:00pm (Hong Kong Time) Venue Online Event (Zoom meeting link will be shared to participants before the event)
